name: Ratta Tat-Tat Uzi Cat
description:
When society is faced with an epidemic of plague proportions, there is only one feline who can clean it up. Ratta tat-tat! it's Uzi Cat! 

Survive as a feisty feline armed with an Uzi, (Sometimes two Uzis!) and kill as many plague-infested squeaks as you can in this last-stand scenario.

Features:

* Power-ups! (Become a tank-treading puss, or a Jet-juking feline of fury, or duel wield Uzis.)

* Catnip anyone? (Slow time down.)

* Acheesements! 

* Gibs and Mayhem!

Known Bugs:

* Sometimes when the tank power-up is active the Idle animation will briefly switch back to Uzi Cat's Idle Animation.
